mapper.select: select csc.t_store_category_id AS id, csc.t_store_id AS storeId, csc.t_parent_id AS parentId, csc.t_category_name AS name, csc.t_create_time AS createTime, csc.t_update_time AS updateTime, csc.t_sort_no AS sortNo from codeworld_store_category AS csc left join codeworld_store AS cs on csc.t_store_id = cs.t_store_id where csc.t_store_id = #{storeId} and cs.t_merchant_number = #{merchantNumber}
mapper.insert: insert into codeworld_store_category ( t_store_category_id, t_store_id, t_parent_id, t_category_name, t_create_time, t_update_time, t_sort_no ) values ( #{id}, #{storeId}, #{parentId}, #{name}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{sortNo} )
